decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the outbuilding hereby permitted shall be as specified in the application form and on the plans.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan, 235HR 001, 235HR 002 and Planning, Design and Access Statement received on 10/05/2017. 235HR 002 SHEET 002 received on 27/06/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The outbuilding hereby approved shall not be used for purposes other than for storage ancillary to the application property and shall not be used as primary accommodation such as a living room, bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, study or as a separate unit of accommodation
description: Erection of a single storey outbuilding at the rear garden
